mapper.select: select id, project_type, project_name, project_amount, project_leader, start_date, end_date, complete_time, acceptance_department, acceptance_report, task_source, project_area, scale, sheet_number, awards_department, prize_level, project_quality_approval, winning_time, acceptance_time, basic_content, credit_status, submit_status, user_id, schedule, create_time, modify_time, memo, status, audit_status, results_status, coordinate, meridian, coordinate_system, management_level, funding_source, entrust_unit, accept_unit, mobile_phone, phone, address, center_point, synchronization_status, contract_time from two_project.t_mapping_project where id = #{id}

select id, project_type, project_name, project_amount, project_leader, start_date, end_date, complete_time, acceptance_department, acceptance_report, task_source, project_area, scale, sheet_number, awards_department, prize_level, project_quality_approval, winning_time, acceptance_time, basic_content, credit_status, submit_status, user_id, schedule, create_time, modify_time, memo, status, audit_status, results_status, coordinate, meridian, coordinate_system, management_level, funding_source, entrust_unit, accept_unit, mobile_phone, phone, address, center_point, synchronization_status, contract_time from two_project.t_mapping_project limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into two_project.t_mapping_project(project_type, project_name, project_amount, project_leader, start_date, end_date, complete_time, acceptance_department, acceptance_report, task_source, project_area, scale, sheet_number, awards_department, prize_level, project_quality_approval, winning_time, acceptance_time, basic_content, credit_status, submit_status, user_id, schedule, create_time, modify_time, memo, status, audit_status, results_status, coordinate, meridian, coordinate_system, management_level, funding_source, entrust_unit, accept_unit, mobile_phone, phone, address, center_point, synchronization_status, contract_time) values (#{projectType}, #{projectName}, #{projectAmount}, #{projectLeader}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{completeTime}, #{acceptanceDepartment}, #{acceptanceReport}, #{taskSource}, #{projectArea}, #{scale}, #{sheetNumber}, #{awardsDepartment}, #{prizeLevel}, #{projectQualityApproval}, #{winningTime}, #{acceptanceTime}, #{basicContent}, #{creditStatus}, #{submitStatus}, #{userId}, #{schedule}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{memo}, #{status}, #{auditStatus}, #{resultsStatus}, #{coordinate}, #{meridian}, #{coordinateSystem}, #{managementLevel}, #{fundingSource}, #{entrustUnit}, #{acceptUnit}, #{mobilePhone}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{centerPoint}, #{synchronizationStatus}, #{contractTime})
mapper.update:
update two_project.t_mapping_project
project_type = #{projectType},
project_name = #{projectName},
project_amount = #{projectAmount},
project_leader = #{projectLeader},
start_date = #{startDate},
end_date = #{endDate},

where id = #{id}
